attributes.action: consider subsidising essential course material (ie work books) for university students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A student loan is simply not sufficient, when for example a set of three 'essential' Portuguese excercise books can cost over £78. (University of Nottingham). We the undersigned understand that student loans help us to manage with the cost of living, and with tuition, but please consider that at the beginning of any university year, a student may face paying up to and beyond £200. 

We would like the British Government to subsidise material listed by each university as 'core course material'.
